attributes.action: Allow a vote of no confidence in Flixton Councillors Flixton,Manchester,U.K.
attributes.background: Significant concerns are held by the residents of Flixton, Manchester,U.K. that the local councillors are not representing the residents appropriately. It is felt by a majority that the councillors are supporting plans that would be detrimental to the local area that they are supposed to represent

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because the UK Government or Parliament can't pass a motion of no confidence in a local council, this is something that the elected local Councillors could do. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
